wikipedia_page.main: James "Jim"/"Jimmy" Cowan (born (1975-12-04)4 December 1975) is a former professional rugby league footballer who played in the 1990s. He played at representative level for Scotland, and at club level for Oldham (Heritage № 1038) as a Wing.
